attributes.action: Withdraw Britain from the European Community and the Jurisdiction of the European Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Membership of the European Community is removing British Sovereignty and costing Britain money that should be used for the betterment of the British Public.
We, Britain, do not need Europe, it is Europe that wants us, but only for the money we are pouring into the coffers of Brussels.
We do NOT want domination By Germany and France.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
